CustomField.description: Checking this box for Permission Controls associated with a hierarchy (e.g. Region, Practice, or Group) means that the Permission also applies to (Resources belonging to) all nodes lower in the hierarchy, in addition to the specified node.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checking this box for Permission Controls associated with a hierarchy (e.g. Region, Practice, or Group) means that the Permission also applies to (Resources belonging to) all nodes lower in the hierarchy, in addition to the specified node.
CustomField.label: Cascading Permission
